archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.1.5: Induction training for all employees should include explicit coverage of information security and be designed and delivered in a way that will equip them with the knowledge and skills they need to exhibit expected security behaviour.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
